original: BERGHOLM, Albert David Paul, Försäk-ringsdirektör, Djursholm, f Jkpg 30/12 83 av handl P E B o Emma Lindahl, gm Ester Carlsson. Studex Jönkp 04, StHS 04—07. Anst 1 Thule 04—10, vkst dir f försäkr.anst Brage 10—14, i återförsäkr.AB Sverige sed. stift 14, i Pens.anst Sverige 25—29, jourh dir i Sv pers.pens.kass sed. stift 29, styr.led i nat.-fören m emigr 15, Sv sällsk f med forskn sed. 18, sekr o styr.led i Sv försäkr.fören 19, ordf 31, styr.led i AB Sv Jordförmedl sed. 22, rev.ordf i Sv hdlsbkn sed. 33, stdsflm 27—29, Svensk red o ansv utg av Nordisk försäkringstidskrift. Studieresa t Holl o Österr s Försäkr.fören förste Rubensonstip 08. Av trycket: Den inre kolonisationen i Preussen 1888—1906, 09, Räntegårdsinstitut o kolonisa-tionsbol. i Preussen 14, Den preuss ränte-gårdskolonisationen 1907—1917, 17, ett flert art i fackpress i försäkr.fråg. KVO2kl, RNO, RDDO, RNS:tOOlkl, RFinlVROlkl.
translated: BERGHOLM, Albert David Paul, Insurance Director, Djursholm, b. Jönköping 30/12 1883, son of merchant P.E.B and Emma Lindahl, m. Ester Carlsson. Graduated Jönköping 1904, University of Stockholm 1904-1907. Employed at Thule Insurance Company 1904-1910, Deputy Director at Brage Insurance Company 1910-1914, founded Reinsurance AB Sweden 1914, worked at Sweden Pension Institution 1925-1929, Director at Swedish Personal Pension Fund since 1929, board member of National Association for Emigrants since 1915, Swedish Association for Research since 1918, secretary and board member of Swedish Insurance Association since 1919, chairman since 1931, board member of AB Swedish Land Agency since 1922, deputy chairman of Swedish Trade Bank since 1933, member of the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences 1927-1929, editor and responsible publisher of Nordic Insurance Journal. Study trip to the Netherlands and Austria sponsored by Rubenson Scholarship in 1908. Published works include "The Inner Colonization in Prussia 1888-1906" (1909), "Interest Farm Institute and Colonization Companies in Prussia" (1914), "The Prussian Interest Farm Colonization 1907-1917" (1917), several articles in professional journals on insurance matters. Knight of the Royal Swedish Order of Vasa, Knight of the Norwegian Royal Order of St. Olav, Knight of the Danish Order of the Dannebrog, Knight 1st Class of the Finnish Order of the White Rose.
